website_summaries.verdict: A boost midsole combines with a flexible Stretchweb outsole for a responsive, energy-returning ride.
pros: Best available cushioning on an Adidas shoe
Ideal for long runs with notable energy return
cons: Toe box may be too big for some runners

customer_reviews.title: The go-everywhere do-everything shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Wide toebox, low arch, plenty of lovely Boost cushion, it feels like nothing bad could happen to your feet in this shoe. The easy-going uncle of the Boston 6. Only disadvantage is they are a bit heavy (11oz in size 10.5 men). A great recovery, training or long run shoe. The outsole has plenty of grip on trail or in wet conditions too.
customer_reviews.author: Graham King

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoe - well balanced and fantastic bounce
customer_reviews.text: It tends to run slightly small, but for running you really want a good fit, so it really depends on whether you are socks or not. For me, I wear socks, so its just a tad bit small, but I bought some thinner socks and it works great. If you are no-sock runner these should fit as expected. For running, and protection against impact... AMAZING.. I really love these shoes. They are nicely balanced and I can run on hard surfaces (although I avoid that generally - prefer grass/ground). I slightly pronate but I haven't twisted my ankle at all, although I run on uneven surfaces. Super shoe. worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Run_Jamaica

customer_reviews.title: Love Boost!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic shoe. Looks great, extremely comfortable whether walking or running, a lot less dough than my other pair of Ultra Boost shoes. I've mainly used it for several 5K runs, and have only gone up to seven miles so far. Love the comfort and responsiveness of the shoe, both for easy and fast-paced runs. I'm just a huge fan of Boost, and this will remain in my rotation for the next few months!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Cushion in the Soles
customer_reviews.text: After many years of wearing New Balance running shoes, I became uncomfortable wearing them a couple of years ago and gave these a try. Unfortunately, they were not a good substitute, as they seem somewhat cheaply made and the soles are too hard to provide sufficient shock absorption. I recently bought a pair of Brooks Ghost 10 shoes, and those are working much better for me – in fact, so far I think I like them better than my old New Balance shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Tuned-up Big toe?  Will break through.
customer_reviews.text: Impulse buy because I am a fan of old Supernova design and new Boost technology, and it was at a huge sale price. I find them relatively heavy and hot (especially compared to Bostons). Fit is exactly as expected - no up or down sizing. The green is, well, kind of this yellow/blue/green blend - slime a good name. Most important - if you have big toes that curl up at the end, you will break through the top mesh very fast (see foto) - under 100 miles fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE:  100 mi
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'10", 185lbs and run 10-15mi/week outside, running approximately 80-100mi in these shoes. Within the past couple weeks, my feet have become increasingly sore after running, specifically under the fore-foot area (where toes connect to foot), ie. the area of the foot that pushes against the ground when taking another stride. I have been an Adidas Supernova wearer for several years/models and have never had this issue in the past. I question whether it's an issue with the upgrade from prior version(s) and wondering if any one else experienced similar problems/issues.
customer_reviews.author: DREW O'BRIEN

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this shoe will never buy them again. Caused a number of issues during a race. Been using Adidas for years and these were performers to say the least. On the positive side, they were delivered quick and they seem to be durable. Ihopeso, they are getting donated to a shelter.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Mahan

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver....
customer_reviews.text: I have HORRIBLE feet. I was born with flat feet, I'm now overweight, and I have a job that requires me to stand for 10 hours a day. Every step is a new adventure in pain. This is my second pair. These shoes, combined with a Dr. Scholl's insert, are the only things keeping me going. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Hegedus

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with good heel and midsole support
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping (arrived sooner than promised). Great quality shoe, Love the foot room. I put 75 miles on them so far and they hold up well. They are a tad bit cushier than my preference but for my age and knees that is not really a bad thing. IT could be for that extra boost as these are branded for that purpose. I read on other reviews that the Supernova 8's had the perfect cushioning and boost. I never tried those as they are out of production now. Overall the Supernova 9 is a good shoe and I am confident it will hold up well for my marathon.
customer_reviews.author: AdoreQual

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable shoes for someone who does a lot of walking
customer_reviews.text: I live in a walking-based city and rarely walk less than 5 miles a day. My previous go-to shoes were some Sketch Air Sketchers, and I was sad to replace them. These are just as comfortable and I have walked 200 miles in them so far (according to my always-present fitness tracker). They are just beginning to show the absolute smallest amount of wear on the pads on the bottom and will likely last me a rather long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vermillion

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel great! I'm not an avid runner and sometimes have bad form. With these I don't feel the hard heel strikes when I start losing form. I do have to use a racers loop though because it feels a little loose in the back. And that means I need to buy longer laces.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I’ve gone with supernovas for years, mostly for the arch support and the width, but they’ve changed the design several times over the years, some of which I was not so much a fan of, but these are pretty comfy. Not disappointed. I use these for running and if I’m going to be walking a lot. Only had for a couple weeks so far, but if they’re anything like the previous models it’ll last me at least a year. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kel9

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic heel cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Most reviews were right on. Lots of room in toe box, shoelaces on the shorter side. Tongue kind of narrow. Fantastic heel cushioning! When I put them on, I wanted to go for a run right away! Very comfortable shoe!! Update: When you ties shoes really firm, it has a painful sensation at top of laces. You almost have to wear slightly loosened.
customer_reviews.author: Justthefacts

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. A bit sloppy with the tounge, but overall a great shoe. The toe box is a bit bigger than I am used to, but after messing with the laces I got it just about right. I’ve been told by folks who have run in the supernova that they last a long time. I like the “boost” foam. I can feel the response on longer runs. I must admit that I am still partial to my Brooks Ghosts, but these are excellent runners... I would recommend them..
customer_reviews.author: TJJ

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe on the market for me.
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe I've ever run in. I went away from the Supernova a few years ago and got injured. There was no reason to try another running shoe and I never will again as long as the Supernova is in production. This is the most supportive, comfortable show for a person who struggles with metatarsal pain and bursitis. I would give these shoes a 10 star rating if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Patterson Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for roads
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the best cushioning I have ever had in a shoe. Not the fastest, but make pavement less noticeable. A touch narrow if you need extra big toe room. But they break in quick. Have 150 miles so far. Should be able to get 500.
customer_reviews.author: Koi

customer_reviews.title: and I'm simply in love with the shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of supernovas, and I'm simply in love with the shoe. They fit true to size and are comfortable for lifestyle just as effectively as they are as a running shoe. I use them in the gym and while around town and my feet never felt better!.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: would have given this 5 stars if the sole wasnt ...
customer_reviews.text: would have given this 5 stars if the sole wasnt so cheap, they tried to keep the shoe light by removing way to much sole material during manufacturing and such they wear through way before the rest of the shoe begins to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: real tech

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great walking shoe. Fits MY feet perfect. Plenty of cushion. I do not run in these shoes on the road, I bought a second pair for gym workouts and the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: IrishRebel

customer_reviews.title: Great cushioning Good wide toe box
customer_reviews.text: The heel is cut lower than average so when running up hill you will feel less support around the back of the ankle. Tight out of the box around the outer sidewalk and outer arch where the 3 stripes are. After 10 miles issue resolved. Great cushioning Good wide toe box.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing new balance for a long time but wanted to try something more affordable. I ordered these and have been very happy with them. These will be my new go to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Turk

customer_reviews.title: Ouch and blisters.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe if you are a ballerina.way to narrow for the other 98 percent of us.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Craddock

customer_reviews.title: different model received, but I have to stick with this one...
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered the black and grey, blue model , however I have received the full grey. I have no time to change the model because I am sending this as a gift and I have no time left . I am really upset because the original model selected was this one, but I have no other choice. otherwise the shoe is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Sanhueza

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bad Shoes, poorly made. I have 6 pairs of Adidas and like them in general.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Long time user
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in adidas SuperNovas since 1998. It's a great fit for me and my stride so this latest purchase continues that legacy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shoe as part of an Amazon Wardrobe. Had a ton of cushion but weighed a ton. May be good for some but this shoe was not for me so i ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: MJordan

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable and fit great
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and fit great. They seem like they'll hold up well but I haven't had them very long yet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves them!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift and my grandson wears them just about everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Msnitab

customer_reviews.title: Best marathon shoe
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite running shoe. I have nikes, new balance and brooks but Addidas is the best. Ran the indianapolis marathon and had zero foot pain. 2 yrs ago ran Chicago marathon in new balance and my feet were throbbing the last 5 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a.
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a...shoe. Perfection. Most supportive BOOST shoe that I have owned and I absolutely love them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: feels good on feet
customer_reviews.text: Cushion and with Boost, feels good on feet. Longevity is about the same as other running shoes so comfort is key!
customer_reviews.author: Petor Third

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these shoes to the runner who has just began running or is just in the gym looking to use a great shoe this would be the one for you !!
customer_reviews.author: Armando S.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well, but they were used. The company didn’t even bother to clean them before they shipped them to me. The soles were black, like the person who wore them running outside.
customer_reviews.author: MLP

customer_reviews.title: Love these running shoes
customer_reviews.text: The cushioning, bounce and toe box space are great. Does a good job of keeping the tongue from moving too much. Will need to find a more modern shoe but until I can get to a running store and putting on extra miles, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great performance after three months
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in these regularly for almost three months and they are excellent. Not as comfortable as my for Adidas Response Boost-- which I can no longer find, sadly-- but they are great runners.
customer_reviews.author: Futureboy

customer_reviews.title: Very good and solid running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good and solid running shoe. It is a bit wider and heavier than my last supernova shoes (from 2016)... still very comfortable. Most of my running shoes, including supernova are 8.5US, however I think this one could be an 8 so consider that size difference if you’re taking old supernovas as a reference.
customer_reviews.author: Powell

customer_reviews.title: A bit too small in the uppers, but otherwise delightful
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet with a medium arch so I'm usually between a 9 - 10 US. The fit guide suggested 9. The soles fit perfectly but the upper was waaaay too tight. My feet went numb after 5 mins of wearing. I unlaced them completely and re-laced while my foot was in them - much improved. They are super comfortable now, and I love the stretchy toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R Munn

customer_reviews.title: loved how it looked when I got it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I read somewhere that they were the most durable running shoes of 2018. loved how it looked when I got it, but they were too small for me. I normally wear a size 11 or 11.5, so I bought it in a size 12, but they feel too small when I run.
customer_reviews.author: Aden

customer_reviews.title: heel is not correct for running
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel great. The way the heel is build on these shoes are not designed for running. The heel will slip on long runs.
customer_reviews.author: Rase La Chapelle

customer_reviews.title: ... uses these for long distance and says they are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these for long distance and says they are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: spectacle

customer_reviews.title: Great marathon training shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Fit is exactly as expected. There is a lot of cushioning inside the shoe as well as on the outside. Def not a lightweight shoe. But talk about comfortable? These are it. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: jbryand

customer_reviews.title: When wearing it, I felt a little stiff and ...
customer_reviews.text: When wearing it, I felt a little stiff and little responsive. After finished first 5 miles, I felt it started to soften and vivid.
customer_reviews.author: Yuzhong

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, size as expected. More cushion than the Mizuno Wave Ride 22, Nike Pegasus 35 and Saucony Ride ISO.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: My go to running shoe. Ran 6 marathons in the last pair. Ordered 3 more when they became avail so I always had them
customer_reviews.author: AZJoe

customer_reviews.title: Don't give up too soon.
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried these on, they didn't feel great. But I stuck with it and after a few days of breaking them in, they began to feel like running on clouds. I'm glad I didn't give up on them. They do feel a little loose in the heal, but it hasn't been a problem during my runs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: like Response Boost
customer_reviews.text: Have worn 10.5 in Adidas for the last 5 years. The toe box in these is more roomy than previous models, like Response Boost. Men's 10 would have fit better. Shoe feels awesome when running. Will be ordering size 10 moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: shannon carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great ride
customer_reviews.text: Some of the most comfortable does I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: KTH

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and great support.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes. The fit is great and provides excellent support.
customer_reviews.author: Jon - Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Adidas running are perfect shoes always. Simply are great, very comfortable. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Jose Emilio Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite show. I have high arches and these are the only shoes I wear to workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cool.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable. The top is very thin and breaths well. I like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Fsuholley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe!. Fits well and is light weight but supportive.
customer_reviews.author: C Straws

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and extremely comfortable! Unlike many running shoes that I have owned in my life, these take punishment and continue to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great walking shoes. I'm going on my third pair and love them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Socarras

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking, comfortable shoes. The Boost material is very thick and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hanly

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sneaker! It fits as expected 5* for comfortable and fast delivery in 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Duc Minh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: he said the fit is perfect, feels gret when he is running
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves them, he said the fit is perfect, feels gret when he is running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is just simply awesome. And the grey ones are really stylish which ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just simply awesome. And the grey ones are really stylish which can be worn for everyday usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wear this shoe for long runs, can't complaint. Size slightly large, but it's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: H.Q.T

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes. Little tight but hopefully will get better ...
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. Little tight but hopefully will get better after being broke in.
customer_reviews.author: banon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, easy shopping experience, delivered on time, fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Connell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe. I bought this for the extra cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Leonor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight make it the perfect shoe for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my third pair. Comfortable and lightweight make it the perfect shoe for my active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, i love the boost technologies
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, i love the boost technologies, its a little bit large than my Asics Nossa Tri 11, in the same size (11.5 M).
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Buy them. Probably one of the most comfortable shoes I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: E.H.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes seem to fit expectedly, yet they cause ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seem to fit expectedly, yet they cause some pain in my big toes when running, probably based upon how the insole has a divot for your big toe to fit in.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great cushioning but with nice bounce. It's a fast shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Sun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice cushioning, great for all distances. A little expensive but a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rogerio Hideo Takahashi

customer_reviews.title: Good running sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Almost excellent sneakers for running. Very comfortable. Technology of sneakers very helpful while running
customer_reviews.author: Alexei

customer_reviews.title: ... is nothing wrong with this vendor - vendor is great. Adidas narrowed the toe box and lost me
customer_reviews.text: THere is nothing wrong with this vendor - vendor is great. Adidas narrowed the toe box and lost me.
customer_reviews.author: Weldon Moore

customer_reviews.title: Would not order or recommend them at all
customer_reviews.text: Used maybe 3 months before the soul started to in glue. Also the material on top has a whole. I only use them for walk to and from work which is 1 mile in each direction. Would not order or recommend them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best running shoes I have ever bought. The fit is perfect and it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing. I like it very much. But The package is broken.
customer_reviews.author: RockyFu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received a totally different size and color than the item I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: amazing pair of shoes that look really good. Fit perfectly, and as expected. The shoe is comfortable and really soft under the foot. I am quite a heavy runner and was suffering from Shin splints with my last pair of shoes. These shoes have already felt 100x better, just from the 5 or so runs I have been on them with. I have run them in now, and they feel great. For the price these came at, I feel like I have completely gotten my moneys worth and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Paid double for these same exact shoes at a running store. Used them to run in 1/2 marathon two weeks after purchase - no issues. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: OKM

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: After using a lot of running shoes, I can say those Supernova are a very good product for training. I recomend them!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Laborda Morador

customer_reviews.title: These are extremely comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I have run in earlier models of this shoe for several marathons. Successfully. One thing with this model is the do run slightly big. Not big enough to go another size down, but definitely bigger than past models. Overall though they are a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Y.

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Supernova M Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Challenge yourself to a longer run with confidence in these men's shoes. A boost midsole combines with a flexible STRETCHWEB outsole for a responsive, energy-returning ride. The engineered mesh upper with seamless panels provides ventilated comfort, while the heel hugs and guides your foot.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
